root.str: V26 Maelstrom Turbo Laser: Auraxium Medal
AV Mine Detonates, dealing heavy damage
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 11 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 11 shells.

Amidst the sprawling battlefields, the insidious sprouting of the SpacePumpkin swarms sow chaos throughout Auraxis!

  • The Halloween Event is in full swing, with some new goodies to see and do.
  • A new Seasonal Directive is available and ends with a truly "Terrifying" reward!
  • Find and destroy SpacePumpkins and the rare Galact-O-Lanterns on each continent, but beware, something larger and far more dangerous lurks.
  • The Depot is filled with limited-time camos, weapons, and cosmetics.
Reduces cooldown time to 45 seconds and increases duration to 11.25 seconds.
Liberty Arsenal's foray into scout rifles was the LA55 Ranger. It features a high capacity magazine for sustained long range fire.
Activate to repair 25% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 45 seconds.
Select the Flash from the list of vehicles, then click the Spawn button to create it.
A developer's natural habitat the game studio! Support PS2 with Membership and keep Devs in a studio where they belong.
Single Use Indar Rock Armor Camo
Earn heal or shield recharge experience
Applies a Crystal Camo 02 camo pattern to your character. TR use only.
The E540 Halberd fires 85 mm armor-piercing rockets. All factions can use this weapon.
Adds 5 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 40 grenades.
Assist Nanite Systems' efforts to scan the area by accessing the waypoint menu and selecting the "Scan the Area" waypoint.
<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> I don't see any real damage here. Just some marks on the walls. Turn on the diagnostics system so we can see anything serious enough to warrant manual repairs.
It appears Foster is no longer here. Maybe the datapad on his desk is a clue.
Reduces damage taken from flak by 10%.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Applies a decal to your armor. NSO use only.
Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, applies one-way shields to structure openings to help protect the defenders inside. VS only.
Improved turn, roll, and agility. (More effective than previous rank)
Drifter Jumpjets allow the user to safely glide across long distances for up to 28 seconds.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Scythe by 60 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> I will mark the specific entry points when you arrive in the correct conditions.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 400 rounds.
A bundle of Lunar tire variants for the Flash, Harasser, ANT, and Sunderer. All factions can use these items.
Light Assault: Kill a Light Assault, Heavy Assault, Heavy Weapons, Infiltrator, Medic, Engineer and Sniper
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
This customization adds a Orange decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
Increases the health restored by reviving allies.
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.

A compensator redirects gases upward, reducing vertical recoil. The increased sound pressure will cause the player to show on the minimap from farther away, and increased weapon bulk reduces accuracy when firing from the hip.
The Dingo launches a barrage of short-range anti-aircraft missiles which use a smart-lock guidance system that steers them into enemy aircraft they get within range of.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 rounds.
Get the most popular Heavy Assault weapons at a discounted price!

Creates a nanite field that regenerates shields in a 6 meter radius. Each cert rank increases the regeneration rate.

Using Ablity will equip the deployable.
[*target*] failed to leave the platoon because they are not the leader (?).
The 20mm AP Cannon fires armor piercing rounds which are ideal for inflicting heavy damage to armored targets
Revenge is sweet, but why stop there? VS use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> I was informed that you reached the facility. Our technicians tell me that these facilities siphon a considerable amount of energy from the atmosphere. This energy can be harnessed to do incredible things.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rounds.
Melee kills fully recharge Cloak capacitor
Fire Ten Shots as a Medic
Warpgates are also how we travel between the continents of Auraxis. Now, use the warpgate terminal here to get you out of the simulation and onto Sanctuary. Interact with the warpgate terminal.
Apply the Amoeba camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Decreases the target acquisition time of the rocket launchers lock-on capability by 25%.
<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> These heat signatures are probably something normal like a brush fire or a still-operational solar battery, but we need to know for sure.
NC - Heavy Pistol - Mid - V2 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Equipped with an extended magazine, the Hailstorm's generous ammo capacity has saved many soldiers who would've been caught reloading without it. TR use only.
When equipped, the recharge delay for damaged Personal Shields will be reduced by 1.6 second.
Apply the single use Indar Highlands v1 camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

Allows cortium to regenerate slowly over time.

Disabled when bombardment shield is active.
Cortium is used to fuel the MAD utility device and the Bombardment Shield. Shield is created when deploying into Skylance Battery mode. Find "Deployment: Skylance Battery" passive system in the "Colossus Certs" screen for more details.

Single use consumable. Carry up to 2 on the field between resupplies. 40 max.
The Javelin XS-1 is an experimental single-passenger vehicle with hover capabilities, allowing it to quickly traverse all types of terrain.
Get started on the right foot with this bundle designed specifically for the Medic and Engineer classes!
Increasing this slider to the right will increase mouse sensitivity for general vehicle controls. (Default: 0.25)
Increases the amount of resources you gain by 30%

Purchase an enlistment contract that aligns you to a VS, NC, or TR "home faction." While this contract is active, you will be able to create or join Outfits with your assigned home faction, and you will adhere to population limits of that faction. You must return to Sanctuary to change home factions or enter into temporary Freelance contracts.

Membership is required to maintain the Home Faction assignment, and dropped Memberships will place you into a Freelance state, but will not kick you from an Outfit you're currently a part of.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 144 rounds.
Expels a strong wave of medical nanites around the user, instantly healing nearby wounded soldiers.

No longer functional, break down for ISO-4.
Reduces the duration which Concussion and Flash Grenades affect you by 40%.
Slows and disorients enemies within its blast radius.
This energized shield has IFF properties that only allow authorized infantry units to pass through. Shield Generators have icons that match their associated shields.
Can carry 3 additional rockets of any type.
Modifies the module interface with the Medical Applicator to restore health to the user upon reviving friendly soldiers.

Whenever you spend longer than a total of 20 seconds outside of cloak without taking damage, your cloak's visibility will be reduced by 75%. Dying or taking damage from enemy sources will reset the benefit countdown. <font color="#dc9c36">Infiltrator only.</font>
Kill enemy Combat Medics as a Combat Medic.
If you've been out of a fight for a while, you may always use the "J" key to re-enter it. Join Combat will always transport you to an "active" area on the continent.
Conduct the delivery of damage to any of the enemy's main battle tank systems as well as to any of thier Lighting tanks.
Increases maximum Nanite Revive Grenade capacity
On a headshot kill, instantly restore 200 shield.
Explosive detected on spawn control unit.
Pressing the SPACEBAR while looking at the map will center your view on your current location.

The enlightened Vanu Sovereignty embraces the legacy and technology of the Vanu, a long-lost alien civilization. They believe that doing so is the only path forward for humankind.

"Technology Equals Might."
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 27 rounds.
Adds 7 rounds to the default magazine size.
The Titan-150 HESH is loaded with high-explosive squash head rounds that sacrifice some effectiveness against armor for increased lethality to enemy personnel. NC use only.
Earn kills or assists against enemy players as a vehicle gunner.
Disable Auto Join on Log In
Further reduces the amount of damage taken from explosions.
RNGTEK's open reflex design allows for clearer target viewing than traditional ironsights.
Prepare for glory with new weapons and gear.

NS built the Annihilator with an Advanced Targeting Processor to lock-on to both air and ground targets. While it cannot dumbfire its payload, the Annihilator reloads considerably faster than its unguided counterpart. All factions can use NS weapons.
Increases Charger Grenade capacity to two
Reduces damage taken from anti-tank mines by 50%.

Exclusive Members Only Content
COMING SOON!
Apply the Starburst camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
Adds 6 rounds to the default magazine size.
TR Bombs go BOOM when they hit their target.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Hey, soldier. That ANT he's talking about can also be used as a weapon. Wipe out a few enemies with it instead and I'll make it worth your time.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 4 rockets.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 rockets.
Adds 13 rounds to the default magazine size.
The Recon Detection Device's dart pulses every 3.25 seconds to momentarily detect the location of fast-moving enemies, including cloaked infiltrators, in a 25 meter radius for 20 seconds.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Liberator Inertial Dampener - Level 1
Apply the single use California Scrub camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 shells.
Improved handling and hill climbing. (All attributes increased over previous rank)
Join an Outfit, reap the benefits.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
The Galaxy is an air transport that can be used to hot drop up to 11 soldiers. It has four weapon mounts that can be used for defense.
Resupply allies near or on our front line.
Allows the engineer to construct a MANA anti-infantry machine gun turret. It is equipped with a projectile shield that protects the operator from forward facing threats.
Implants enhance your soldier with various perks as long as you supply them with energy. Implants and energy chargers can drop during any activity that grants you experience.
We've defused the bomb at the Central SCU!
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Rhino Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.
Retrieve Hadley's gift from under the tree
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
While active, the Elysium Refinery with gather and process Elysium Crystals that are broken down within 75 meters of it.
A high density particle field that helps protect the user from injury. The shield will regenerate over time if not receiving damage.
Grants access to grenades which simulate the sound of weapons fire, project false radar signatures, and fool automated anti-infantry turrets.
Grenade Bandolier has been removed from your Engineer and its cert cost refunded.
<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> That was the final console. Return to Sanctuary and speak with Foster when you're ready for your next mission.

While deployed, the Prowler generates shield layer at a rate of 75 shield per second, to a maximum of 1000 shield health. Taking damage pauses shield regeneration for 4 seconds, and a fully depleted shield will not begin regenerating until out of combat for 10 seconds.
Apply the Giraffe camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Locate and hack the Eisa Tech Plant terminal on Esamir.
Unlock consumable items for the Light Assault's utility slot. Utility items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Earn a Copper Medal on 5 different carbines.
is currently away from their keyboard.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> It shouldn't take long for us to begin applying this technology elsewhere. Thank you for your help.
Hold [%s] to hack the computer console
Reduces the acquire timer of the Magrider by 630 seconds.
Shooting an enemy's legs will deal less damage than normal. Aim for the chest or higher!
We will use this influence to help us control territory, and create more time for our scientists to discover. Go with Vanu.
We've lost an outpost to the rebels.
Welcome to the <font color="#7ff4ff">Nanite Systems Implant Nano-Cycler!</font>
Single Use 艾美瑞什 Grassland Vehicle Camo
Failed to set the squad leader.
Customize your Flash with this blue blinking antenna ball. NC use only.

Their armor and shields can take more punishment than other soldiers can, allowing them to dominate in direct close-quarters conflict. In addition to their high survivability, they can use anti-vehicle or anti-air rockets to take down enemy mechanized forces.
Use any Sniper Rifle to kill enemies as an Infiltrator.
Weapons in the assault rifle family are issued to Combat Medics.
Increases fuel capacity and regeneration speed by 11%.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 15%
Don't put on the internet thanks
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.5 seconds, reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 116 meters and blocks enemy Engagement Radars.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Viper Fins. VS use only.
Apply the single use Giraffe camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 5%

<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> We cared less about developing weapons of war and more about nurturing our people and the world around us. Or maybe I'm just nostalgic for the illusion of paradise that masked the gradual slide into perpetual war.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 5 shots.
TR: MAX Flame 01 Right: Rail: Extended Description
Cannot invite any more players because your platoon is full.
Are you sure you want to leave this squad?
Gold Recon Detect Device skills reset and certs refunded
<font color="#00FFAA">Coordinator Tolland:</font> Hey, kid. Nice job on grabbing that Cortium. That'll be a great skill to have at your disposal on Oshur. Sending payment to your account now.
Text that explains what rating the game has and a description of what that rating means.
艾美瑞什 Hearts Vehicle Camo
Applies a camo to your armor, weapon or vehicle. NC use only.
Bring joy to your enemies before you destroy them with this festive Elf horn. All factions can use this gear.
Allows the user to carry and place one additional anti-personnel mine or two additional anti-tank mines.
This unconventional hatchet has been designed to sow maximum terror on the battlefield. VS use only.

The treaties may have permitted the empires to establish footholds on Oshur without firing a single shot, but everyone knows that the carnage started two minutes after. With the battle for Oshur now fully underway, it's time to move to the front lines and fight for the New Conglomerate!
Apply the Woven Web camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
The M60 Pug lobs high explosive warheads with a large blast radius and maintains light anti-armor capabilities on direct hits.
Celebrate the legacy of PlanetSide with this Solsar themed bundle! This bundle contains weapons for all factions, and cosmetics for VS, NC, and TR.
This 4th Anniversary Edition Archer anti-material rifle was developed by Nanite Systems to dispatch MAX-based threats at medium to long range.
More Outfit Resources required to join.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rounds.
Activate to repair 20% of the MAX's health over 12 seconds. Can be activated once every 60 seconds.
Large wall that once fully constructed can withstand a moderate amount of damage. NC only.
Wintery holiday activities are upon us!
Adds 3 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 shots.
Camera guided missiles allow the user to make adjustments mid-flight, vastly increasing accuracy and range.

Enables cortium regeneration over time. Restores 41.5 cortium a second.

Disabled when bombardment shield is active.

Cortium is used to fuel the MAD utility device and the Bombardment Shield.

Shield is created when deploying into Skylance Battery mode. Find "Deployment: Skylance Battery" passive system in the "Colossus Certs" screen for more details.
The fully automatic NS-61B Emissary operates comfortably at mid-range, thanks to its accuracy and large magazine. This variant of the NS-61 features a black finish. All factions can use this weapon.

The A.S.P is available to any Battle Rank 100+ player.

Characters who join the program reset their rank progression and can unlock special class modifications every 25 ranks.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Alright, op... ... Secu... portation and... ...Shattered Warpgate. We... mu... [END]

Along with 2000 certification points to help you shine on the battlefield, this bundle comes with a Platinum MKV Suppressed SMG and all its attachments, weapons for the heavy assault and MAX exo-suit, a camo, and a 7 day experience boost. Note: The boost, certs, and attachments will apply to the purchasing character only.
Pull your weight out there! We're losing it!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 20 shots.
Increases the reserve ammo of your rocket launchers by 1 magazine, and holstered rocket launchers will auto-reload every 8 seconds.
This armor can only be worn by NC Light Assault troopers.
NS35 Frag Cannon Right Gold Medal
Allows characters to equip sidearms in their primary weapon slot. Does not include Directive reward weapons.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Mosquito by 60 seconds.
Increases fuel capacity and regeneration speed by 14%.
NC - Auto-Pistol - Mid - V5 Description(Delete Me -BB)
As the Heavy Assault class, interact with consoles in any Bio Lab on Indar, Hossin, or 艾美瑞什.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Prevent the Vanu Sovereignty from locking 艾美瑞什
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 23 shells.
This customization adds a broken glass decal to the Galaxy's cockpit.
The Prowler defensive certification 'Reinforced Top Armor' has been removed. Spent certifications have been refunded.

USE
Right-click on map to use.

DESCRIPTION
Requires Generic Asset permissions.

Deploys a terminal capable of spawning one Flash or Javelin.

Max 48.
2 minute duration.
Increases the strength of the air brakes on the Galaxy by 10%.
Adds 8 rounds to the default magazine size.
Damage or destroy enemy aircraft with any ground based weaponry.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Attempting to capture <font color=\"#00C3FF\">[*region*]</font> from <font color=\"#00C3FF\">[*faction*]</font>.
The M12 Kobalt is a 50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. All factions can use this weapon.
Reduce the acquire timer of the Reaver for 1 hour. Rank 8 required.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.

Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.25 seconds, reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 174 meters and reduces detection from enemy Engagement Radars by 100 meters.
<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Foster:</font> I'm glad you could make the trip to Sanctuary, operative. I'd prefer not to broadcast this information if it can be avoided.
Apply the single use Desert Scrub v2 camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
The hybrid laser reduces the weapon's hipfire cone of fire by 33% and hipfire pellet spread by 33%.
While piloting a vehicle, earn gunner kills on vehicles that are defending an Aerial Anomaly.
Any class may equip this device to repair player made structures. The rate of healing is equivalent to an Engineer's rank 3 Nano-Armor Kit.
This Flail does not have an AI Module affecting it.
Premium Tier 3: +33.6 Daily Passive Cert Points

This expansion released on October 29, 2002 and brought with it revolutionary mechanics that are still used in MMOs to this day. It was the first to introduce a travel hub, which allowed the ability to fast-travel to different parts of the world without having to wait for boats or trek across continents.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Gold Tiger Fins. NC use only.
Consumes fuel to increase top speed.
Get a selection of Magrider weapons and cosmetics at a discounted price!
Increases the amount of Scramblers held at a single time
Destroy the very rare Galact-O'-Lantern.Completing this directive awards the title "the Wrecker"
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "Y" Hood Ornament.

Appearing in EverQuest's first expansion: The Ruins of Kunark on April 24, 2000, he is the greatest emperor of the Iksar Empire. Using necromancy, he returned to life by stealing the body of his own son.

Orbital scans of Oshur show that rich veins of Cortium extend throughout the island continent. Prepare for the journey by showing mastery over the Advanced Nanite Transport, a vehicle able to mine and haul Cortium or use the potent mineral to power its various tools.
Ambusher Jump Jets provide a quick burst of forward thrust, with limited vertical height and an 8 second cooldown between uses.
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Leaf camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 555 rounds.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Well, well, well. Look at what we have here. You can't see it, but I'm looking at a report that says there is a third vehicle schematic out there.
Unlock the MGR-C Charger with a full complement of attachments. For NC use only.
Apply the Purple Giraffe camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
There are no items in this category.
The MSW-R was designed to meet the needs of mobile Terran Republic shock troopers. Its light weight and fast reload time allows forward soldiers to push forward without stopping. TR use only.

Vanu Esamir's AdvWep labs designed the heavy-hitting Flare VE6 to pack the most punch per shot. In the hands of an experience marksman, the Flare can wreak havoc on enemy infantry at close to medium ranges. VS use only.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a hood ornament. All factions can use this gear.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Chrome Flash Hood Ornament.

Based off of its bigger assault rifle brother, the smaller Pulsar C was developed with an emphasis on stopping power. While not as easy to control, the heavy-hitting Pulsar C is far more devastating at close range. VS use only.
Decreases muzzle flash and audio range.
Your petition to join [*guild*] has been rejected.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 3.
Unlocks access to Anti-Vehicle Grenades. Engineer only.
Apply the Indar Savanna camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Place a personal waypoint in the highlighted area.
Your petition to join [*guild*] has been rejected.
Error: Mentor squads cannot be converted into a platoon.
Deploying in %1 second%2, press [ %0 ] to cancel
Standing still for a time provides increased small arms resistance.
A 12x magnitude zoom precision sniper scope.
The deploy location collides with existing objects
The overcharged Ursa VE23's highly compressed plasma projectiles make this weapon lethal in close quarters.
Apply the single use Urban Forest camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Sprint Legacy Mode: When Sprint Toggle and Sprint Legacy Mode is ON, sprint will work as an earlier version did ( and unlike most FPS games). We recommend most users leave this options off.
Unlocks access to Smoke Grenades for ALL classes.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Can you hear me, operative? The energy abnormalities have suddenly disappeared, if only we had gotten here sooner...

Activate to repair 10% of the vehicle over 5 seconds. Also prevents the vehicle from overheating when firing during that time. If the vehicle is on fire or overheating when activated, it will also immediately remove those effects. Can be activated once every 45 seconds.

Overheating occurs when firing the primary weapon while deployed into Skylance Battery mode. Find "Deployment: Skylance Battery" passive system in the "Colossus Certs" screen for more details.
Killing an enemy soldier increases cloak charge by 23%.

<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> First we need to master the terrain and understand the nearby choke points for the battles to come. If that gunfire is any indication, the truce is already over.
The Basilisk is a 20mm heavy machine gun that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. All factions can use this weapon.
Unlock enhancements for the Light Assault's suit slot. Suit Certifications can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 22 rounds.
Gunner Kill Assist Share - Wasp Prototype
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 90 rounds.

Trades 10 Polystellarite for 42 Synthium.

Uses resources in the Outfit Armory.

Finishing a reload will increase your sprint speed by 20%, your jump height significantly, and allow you to enter sprint almost instantly, for the next 1.5 seconds. Firing your weapon ends this effect early.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34</font>: But first, there's something I need you to do for me. Head back to Esamir, and collect 50 strange glowing plant cores. Go on, get to it.
Ground vehicles can resupply at ammunition towers. Look for the large tower with a glowing ammo icon above it.
Increases the maximum duration the shield can remain active to 12 seconds.
Make your presence known with this horn from Nanite Systems. All factions can use this gear.
This customization changes the color of the cockpit glass to Tan.
Turning this on will enable the centralized HUD display.
Bring joy to your enemies before you destroy them with this festive Kazoo horn. NSO use only.
Interact with Bio Lab consoles as a Medic
Cycle through chat tabs by pressing CTRL+TAB.
The Lightning is a fast light tank with a main cannon that can be configured for many roles.Drive this Lightning to the waypoint marked on your HUD.
Apply the Amoeba camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Apply the Dazzle Dizzy camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.15 seconds.
You have declined the invitation to join [*guild*].
Warp to 艾美瑞什, Esamir, Hossin, or Indar
What frightful engine of horror and despair lurks beneath this skull themed bandana?! Just the rest of your face, calm down. Provides a +10% xp bonus when worn during the annual Halloween Event.
Adds chassis lights to the under carriage of the ANT. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1800 rounds.

Killing 3 enemies without being spotted will decrease the visibility of your Infiltrator cloak by 75%. Being spotted or getting killed will reset this benefit. <font color="#dc9c36">Infiltrator only.</font>
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Silver Sparkler Hood Ornament. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 2 missiles.
There has been an error processing your order.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Chrome Tiger Fins. NC use only.
Enable this to suppress a confirmation dialog when warping to a different continent from the Deploy Screen. Disable this to show a confirmation before changing continents. (Default: false)
<font color="#00FFAA">Engineering:</font> Damage report! Starboard superstructure component has been damaged!
Revenge is sweet, but why stop there? TR use only.
There's no 'quit' in a TR soldier!
Silos hold up to 50,000 Cortium and are required to power modules and other core structures. ANTs are required to deposit additional Cortium into a Silo.

<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin</font> Let us do what we can to slow the research efforts of others, while giving our own scientists the time they require. Infiltrate Biolabs held by the enemy and corrupt their network from within.
Press [%s] to speak to robotic entity
Apply the Catscratch camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Adds 3 rounds to the default magazine size.

When this sticky grenade is thrown, it will create the conditions for a lightning strike at its location.

Takes 6 seconds for a bolt to manifest.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.

Use the Heavy Assault rocket launcher or the anti-vehicle turret next to the terminal to blow up an enemy tank.Tanks can take a lot of damage so it will take many shots before it is destroyed.Tanks also take more damage if you shoot them from the side or rear.
Unlock the Digital camo pattern for your armor, weapons and vehicles. TR use only.
Are you sure you want to expend this single-use camo?
Enemies are trying to take the control point. Look for control point A on your map or HUD. Head towards it and defend it.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Scythe to 7 minutes.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Our researchers uncovered a flaw in the security of the newly constructed Containment Sites. Unfortunately, this was discovered too late and the facilities were sabotaged from within.
Apply the Carbonation camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Increases the efficiency of the MAX's capacitor allowing it to recharge at a faster rate.

Repairs 0.75% every second. Damage disables repairs for 8 seconds.
Adds Hubcaps TR004 to your Flash. (DNT)
Adds 15 rounds to the default magazine size.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.

Displays the target's health bar while spotted, increases crosshair IFF detection range, and increases hold breath duration by 160%. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip. Works in vehicles.</font>
Reduces damage from small arms, heavy machine guns, gatling guns, aircraft machine guns, and anti-aircraft machineguns by 20%.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this decal.
Earn a Silver Medal on 3 different weapons.
Bring the vehicle to a complete stop, then deploy the vehicle.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Gold Razor Fins. TR use only.

Celebrate six years of PlanetSide 2 with this massive bundle. Note: Bundle contains equivalent weapons and cosmetics for all 3 Empires. Heroic Boost is granted only to the character that purchases the bundle.
Skull-themed camo. For TR use only.

The standard Vanu Sovereignty plasma grenade, capable of heavily damaging infantry targets.

3 second fuse.
Happy Anniversary! Celebrate with this festive horn that releases a colorful burst of confetti.
This model of the Cycler Automatic Rifle Variant has the same all-purpose usage as the stock model, but with an added single shot fire mode for long range targets.
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Prowler by 5%.
Reduces damage taken from flak, heavy machine gun, and ESF nose gun rounds by 12%.
